description: Good social media app, works offline and everything. Main issues is a lack of customizability, ease of use, and the inability to edit or delete content. Those are all things the roadmap says they are working on though, so in a few years this will probobly be an even better choice.
summary: Great app, will likely be even better in a few years

description: the app is less know for an no reason! I was banned from facebook for reasons that are against free speach. It is time to at least use anoder aps for content that is target to censorhip and social media that punish free speech.
